question: What will be the price of Bitcoin (BTC/USD) on February 15, 2026?
description: Predict Bitcoin's price at market resolution. Current price: ~$75,000
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Bitcoin (BTC/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at 23:30:00 UTC on February 15, 2026.

The final price will be floored to the nearest dollar for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before resolution will be used.
Market range: $75,000 - $95,000
